name: BlinkShot
description: BlinkShot is an arcade style game that uses the NeuroSky MindWave Mobile or MindWave Mobile Plus EEG headset to control a plasma ball cannon to shoot targets.  You concentrate with your mind to aim the cannon, and you blink to fire.  The cannon will only fire when you blink.  The more focus you have the higher the cannon will aim allowing you to hit more targets.
